description:
This tee is especially designed for conditions where you need light and breathable clothes that feel comfortable even though you perspire heavily. The flat seams enhance comfort. Raglan cut sleeves. This tee is extremely light and airy.

Why choose PURE naturals®? Ethical merino ranching in Australia, textile processing by world-famous Schoeller, just down the road from our modern manufacturing partner. 100% superfine (16 micron) merino apparel, made in Europe to our minimal-impact specs. Embrace the PURE naturals® life with sustainable fibers.
name: PURE naturals PURE Tree 100% Merino Wool SS T-Shirt - Mens
